channel.title: Pk Points
channel.description: I made a code or whatever you want to call it... that when you die when you Pk, you get pk points. Well, I don't know where to add this, I've looked all through client.java and can't figure it out. If you could tell me where the Pk drop and kill methods are or the code is please tell me.

item.title: Pk Points
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Adding Pk points when killing another person? Try the person on person packet.

Read full topic

item.title: Pk Points

item.description:
@bbl111 wrote:

I made a code or whatever you want to call it… that when you die when you Pk, you get pk points. Well, I don’t know where to add this, I’ve looked all through client.java and can’t figure it out. If you could tell me where the Pk drop and kill methods are or the code is please tell me.
